nodes.text: Star Wars: Smuggler's Revenge is the third part in the Smuggler's Series. It is an hour-long live audio drama event, directed by Kyle Newman and with David W. Collins playing the role of Han Solo as well as various guests. It premiered on stage at Celebration Orlando on April 15, 2017.

Han Solo reluctantly volunteers to spearhead a mission to acquire a vital piece of hardware essential to the protection and survival of the Rebels newly established Echo Base on Hoth. This dangerous underworld adventure will take Han back to an old stomping ground that he's been desperate to avoid. With his friends at his side, Han Solo will come face-to-face with the reality that revenge runs deep and that their is no escape from the past that is rapidly catching up to him.
